website_summaries.verdict: Blush that offers a natural look, complete with fine minerals and antioxidant vitamins. "Flowerchild" is one of the most popular colors.
pros: Luminous shades that can also be layered over contouring powder
Offers a glowy sheen rather than shimmer
Small packaging that actually contains more product than competitors
Works well with even sensitive skin types
cons: The product can break and crumble in the case

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blush
customer_reviews.text: Very soft if applied lightly but you can build on this for a more dramatic look. Love it. I've tried LOTS of blushes and this is by far my favorite. The color is perfect for everyday with all color of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Questant

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars bc it's not for me, but great product
customer_reviews.text: this is really potent -- one little dab is a bright, bright pink. definitely needs to be blended, blended. and it goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: orangier than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality blush. My only problem with it is that it is more orange colored than described. I though it would be more pink.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Roach

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color - though I will say I think I own this color in every brand of blush! I do love the feel of this product, very silky and soft - and 100% real as I have many other Becca products and it's right on par with them as well. It's just a beautiful pinky color for a nice soft flush of the cheeks. Pairs well with the Becca Bronzer in Duende
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I have brown/black hair and lightly tanned skin with rose/peach undertones. Wild Honey is a nice neutral contrast with enough pop to brighten my face without making me look like a clown. It might be a touch too peachy for the amount of rose in my cheeks, but it goes on smooth, it lasts, and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I kept it as it is a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: I have other Becca blushes and don't understand why this one seems more expensive. I didn't pay attention to how small this compact is. I kept it as it is a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: TGL

customer_reviews.title: ... except for the color I'm know it is a great product as I have used this brand for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product as it was very much lighter that I expected or wanted so it except for the color I'm know it is a great product as I have used this brand for a long time - it was just the color that was not good for me
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Best line of Blushes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Becca blush and I love them. They are very pigmented, so you dont need to get a lot of product on your brush to apply. This is a nice subtle color if you light/medium shade. goes on great, lasts all day, I couldnt be happier with these products.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought....but will work for travel
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMALL - and for the price, thought it may have been bigger, not full size, but not very "miniature"...oh wells, into the travel bag it will go! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tdra1975

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this blush!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god this blush has insane color pay off and is a beautiful color for any skin tone. I highly recommend this blush for anyone looking for a beautiful color that can be worn every day!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and radiant
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this delicate and natural blush is lovely. Not glittery or shiny, but lends a radiant and polished glow. Blends out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The color pay off on this blush is so amazing! You definitely get what you pay for and ...
customer_reviews.text: The color pay off on this blush is so amazing! You definitely get what you pay for and I am so pleased that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Beautiful pigmented color. Smooth application. Wore for a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.author: JT201

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite blush. It was a little darker than I ...
customer_reviews.text: As of right now, this is my favorite blush. It was a little darker than I expected, but it is so lovely. I love pairing this blush with really dark, vampy lipsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Tellez

customer_reviews.title: great But small
customer_reviews.text: First the product came in broken. And it's smaller than the highlighters But the color last a long time on the cheeks. And it's very pretty. I got wild honey
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love my blush
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely breath taking!!! Love Love Love my blush. Wonderful quality!!!! Can't wait to get another shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because it rub off to fast! Also, I have to apply this again and again and it won't stay even if you put primer it come off so quickly. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: I usually avoid blush because I can never find one that doesn't look streaky or have me looking like a clown
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've found BECCA blush, I will never go back to any other brand. This blush adds a luminosity to my skin that I've never had with other blushes. In fact, I usually avoid blush because I can never find one that doesn't look streaky or have me looking like a clown. My cheeks are like pink pearls. I'm Asian, and my skin tone medium with yellow undertones. I'm posting a photo (even though I'm very self-conscious) of me wearing this blush because it really is very distinctive and deserves all the praise and rave reviews it has.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but I have some concerns....
customer_reviews.text: I like this blush....the only thing about it that was somewhat concerning to me was that coincidentally I received two of the same blush for Christmas ; one was bought at a Sephora and the other was purchased here. The packaging and labeling were different, and I'm not sure if this is because this product is a fake or the company truly packages differently on occasion....This made me kind of concerned. Both colors were identical and similar in texture. Just the packaging box and labels were different. The compact was also the same. Just something to be aware of... foreign products can have very harmful chemicals in them.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL FOR COOL SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to find color for my cool skin tone, but Flowerchild blends beautifully. My go-to blush henceforth. UPDATE: More and more pleased with this blush. After using since March am convinced this shade is best for my skin tone. So difficult to find blush for cool skin. I encourage women with cool skin to try. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-s-stuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but you have to use it up in 6 month once you open the package
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Lied about the size of this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was told this would be the standard full size and it wasn't! It was the mini one and WAY smaller than I thought. Its not worth as much as I paid for THIS small of a product. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and ease of use! This blush will last forever, as you only need a tiny bit for outstanding results!
customer_reviews.author: emmyg

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush! Great color and like Becca products . It's not too pink or peachy and good for work or going out !
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush. Smooth and cost less than at saloon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Found my forever blush!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful color with tons of pigment. This is my second time purchasing this blush and I think I will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! I need more!
customer_reviews.text: Can I say-I'm in LOVE!!! This blush has beautiful pigment, and it makes you glow. I love that it doesn't have glitter-I hate glitter, this just gives your skin a healthy radiance. I really love a lot of the Becca prods. Kind of over the luminizing skin perfecters for right now, so I'm getting my glow on with this.
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: ... color with a slight shimmer to it -- very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pigmented peachy color with a slight shimmer to it -- very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush so much would recommend to everyone great color pigment!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love anything and everything from Becca! Their blush is so pigmented highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ran Erica Sun

product_meta.title: Becca Mineral Blush, Flowerchild, 0.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: A luxury, delicate powder for cheeks. Gives natural, radiant color for a healthy look. Helps uplift the complexion to enhance features. Formulated with long-wearing minerals. Velvety texture and not cakey or chalky.
feature_bullets: A luxury, delicate powder for cheeks
Gives natural, radiant color for a healthy look
Helps uplift the complexion to enhance features
